forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 46. North northwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco awakens to a canvas of blue sky, punctuated only by scattered clouds that graciously retreat as the sun reaches its zenith. The crisp air carries a gentle touch, a prelude to a day that promises warmth tempered by a refreshing breeze from the northwest. While San Francisco often dons its familiar foggy veil, today it chooses to show off its clarity, with the Golden Gate Bridge standing proudly against the stunning backdrop, inviting passersby to partake in its beauty. As the temperature lingers around the mid-fifties, one is beckoned outdoors, perhaps to stroll along the Embarcadero or to savor a moment in one of the city's quaint cafés, enjoying the sight of lively streets illuminated by sunlight.

As evening approaches, the subtle shift in temperature offers a gentle reminder of the autumn season. The clear night will invite those who venture outside to bathe in the tranquility of the end of day. A light jacket is advisable, as the cool north northwesterly breeze whispers through the avenues, drawing people toward warm gatherings or perhaps an intimate dinner highlighting seasonal flavors. On such a day, life in the city feels accessible and alive, offering myriad opportunities for simple pleasures under a bright sky slowly transforming into a serene twilight.
